languages.text: "Из-за этого проклятье и пало на нашу расу. Из-за неумения сдержать свое больное любопытство".
"This is why the great curse fell upon our people: because of our inability to curb our most twisted curiosity."
languages.original_text: "Из-за этого проклятье и пало на нашу расу. Из-за неумения сдержать свое больное любопытство".

traits.locale_text: "This is why the great curse fell upon our people. Because of the inability to curb one's twisted curiosity."
"This is why the great curse fell upon our people. Because of the inability to curb one's twisted curiosity."
"This is why the great curse fell upon our people: because of our inability to curb our most twisted curiosity."
"This is why the great curse fell upon our people: because of our inability to curb our most twisted curiosity."
"This is why the great curse fell upon our people: because of our inability to curb our most twisted curiosity."
"This is why the great curse fell upon our people: because of our inability to curb our most twisted curiosity."
"This is why the great curse fell upon our people: because of our inability to curb our most twisted curiosity."

languages.text: "Darum hat der große Fluch unser Volk befallen: Wegen unserer Unfähigkeit, unsere perverseste Neugierde zu zügeln."
languages.original_text: "This is why the great curse fell upon our people: because of our inability to curb our most twisted curiosity."

traits.locale_text: "Darum hat der große Fluch unser Volk befallen: Wegen unserer Unfähigkeit, unsere perverseste Neugierde zu zügeln."

languages.text: « Voilà pourquoi la grande malédiction s'est abattue sur notre peuple, à cause de notre incapacité à réfréner notre curiosité mal placée. »
languages.original_text: "This is why the great curse fell upon our people: because of our inability to curb our most twisted curiosity."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà pourquoi la grande malédiction s'est abattue sur notre peuple, à cause de notre incapacité à réfréner notre curiosité mal placée. »

languages.text: «Y he aquí el origen de la gran maldición de nuestro pueblo: nuestra incapacidad de refrenar nuestra curiosidad más atroz».
languages.original_text: "This is why the great curse fell upon our people: because of our inability to curb our most twisted curiosity."

traits.locale_text: «Y he aquí el origen de la gran maldición de nuestro pueblo: nuestra incapacidad de refrenar nuestra curiosidad más atroz».

languages.text: 「私達の人々に偉大なる呪いがかかったのは、最も歪んだ好奇心を抑えることができなかったからでしょう」
languages.original_text: "This is why the great curse fell upon our people: because of our inability to curb our most twisted curiosity."

traits.locale_text: 「私達の人々に偉大なる呪いがかかったのは、最も歪んだ好奇心を抑えることができなかったからでしょう」

languages.text: “这就是为什么我们的族人招致了可怕的诅咒，因为我们根本无法克制我们最扭曲的好奇心。”
languages.original_text: "This is why the great curse fell upon our people: because of our inability to curb our most twisted curiosity."

traits.locale_text: “这就是为什么我们的族人招致了可怕的诅咒，因为我们根本无法克制我们最扭曲的好奇心。”

languages.original_text: "This is why the great curse fell upon our people: because of our inability to curb our most twisted curiosity."

languages.text: "İşte bu yüzden halkımın üzerine büyük bir lanet çöktü. Çünkü en sapkın meraklarımızı yatıştırmayı beceremedik."
languages.original_text: "This is why the great curse fell upon our people: because of our inability to curb our most twisted curiosity."
